title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1761/90 of 27 June 1990 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1700/89
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1761/90
of 27 June 1990
fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1700/89
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The weighting coefficients referred to in Article 4 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 shall be as specified in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 129, 11. 5. 1989, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 223, 16. 8. 1976, p. 4.
(4) OJ No L 77, 22. 3. 1986, p. 31.
(5) OJ No L 166, 16. 6. 1989, p. 23.
ANNEX
Weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases
Belgium 6,5
Denmark 9,2
Germany 22,4
Greece 1,2
Spain 16,8
France 12,3
Ireland 1,0
Italy 9,3
Luxembourg 0,1
Netherlands 13,8
United Kingdom 7,4
